title: A Gathering of Memories
description: Her heart was fragile from too much pain--would her defenses push Ross away?Ross felt panicked. His words had hurt her. It surprised him, given the way she handled the harsh circumstances of her life. First her mother's death. Then her father's. Then losing the land.Was his compassion for the vulnerable young woman turning to love? And if it was love, what would he do now? "Please, God," he prayed. "Help me. Show me."A poignant tale about love fulfilled, "A Gathering of Memories" will capture the hearts and minds of romantics everywhere.
author: Lori Wick
